root.name: Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Atari Collection 1
root.description: Included GamesMidway Presents Arcade's Greatest Hits: The Atari Collection 1 featured six Atari arcade games. Each game had its own sub-set of options that allowed players to adjust difficulty, starting lives, awarded extra lives, etc. Games included in The Atari Collection 1 were:AsteroidsOptions included:Ships to start: (3-4)BattlezoneOptions included:Missles After (5000, 10000, 20000, 30000): Set the amount of points before Missiles were used against you.Tanks to start: (2-5)First Bonus: (None, 15000, 25000, 50000)Controller: (Arcade, Native)CentipedeOptions included:Lives to start: (2-5)Bonus at: (10000, 12000, 15000, 20000)Difficulty: (Easy, Hard)Player Speed: (1-5)Missile CommandOptions included:Cities to start: (4-7)Bonus at: (None, 8000, 10000, 12000, 14000, 15000, 18000, 20000)Player Speed: (1-5)Super BreakoutOptions included:Balls per game: (3, 5)Game Type: (Cavity, Progressive, Double)Player Speed (1-5)TempestOptions included:Lives to Start: (2-5)Bonus at (None, 10000, 20000, 30000, 40000, 50000, 60000, 70000)Player Speed: (1-5)Minimum rating: When set to 9, players could skip to level 9 at the start screen. If set to Variable, players could skip farther ahead based on the high score.Demo Mode: Allows access to all levels from the start screen, also enables skipping levels during the game by pressing Select. Note: Demo Mode disabled high scores.Difficulty: (Easy, Medium, Hard)
